positive.review:
I found this to be a very relaxing and cute pixel game.

I very much enjoy the different levels, all the customization options, and the letter system.
 The soundtrack for this game is AMAZING 15/10 <3

I am not a fan of most games coming out nowadays most being way too expensive or just made like crap and run like crap, but this was nice refresher, something affordable for most, Easy to pick up, and never has any issues running or anything like that... and something I def feel like my 82 hours and counting was def worth the $5 I spent on this game. 

I would def recommend this to my friends / family.

The dogs and animals in the game are very cute and adorable. 
However, the game has a serious black screen issue. I hope the game developers can properly address this problem, instead of requiring players to manually find the game's launcher file in their folder and change the "Compatibility" option to "Disable Full-Screen Optimization" to solve the issue. 
I have these complaints because many similar desktop games on Steam that I've played don't have this problem, so I believe the developers can and should properly handle this black screen issue.

Remarks : If there are any solutions or updates to this problem (besides telling players to manually adjust compatibility), I will change my comment to positive.

Update: The developers have released an update that automatically resolves this issue, fantastic! This is a really good idle game, highly recommended !!!

My wife was decorating my steam profile and was looking at the steam shops and found the cutest emotes. She pointed at the screen and said we had to buy it. I absolutely love the joy on her face seeing the cute characters or her just decorating. It's usually not my type of game but it was the cutest thing seeing her watch and play with these characters; she even changed a character in the game and named it after me. Thank you for not just bringing my wife joy but Introducing me to this genre of games.

i loved this game so much. every minute of it gave me peace and joy. i also loved the musics as much as the game itself. i couldn't find much more to do after my first save but i still open the game just the look at the things i did. the only thing i didn't like was not being able to go fullscreen.

its incredibly cute but in the 2 days ive had it i feel ive already done everything i could want decor wise. It would be nice if there were some more customization options for the walls/floors and just overall more to do/experience but overall its very cute

I disliked that it sits at the bottom of your screen but you can change the sizing so that was nice. I also enjoyed that it was easy to start playing the game the directions are very straight to the point, and the art style is very cute.
Wonderful and relaxing! Plenty of replay value, and addictive - lovely songs, can listen to them for hours without doing a thing! This is the idler game others should be taking lessons from!
Incredibly cute, relaxing, and addicting. There is zero stress with managing the onsen, only mental health to be gained.
I love Maltese's Fluffy Onsen so much. The game is super cozy and chill which I really like. It has so much fun decor and bath tubs that you can use in your Onsen. 10/10!

ended up playing this game for two hours after buying, its a fun little thing to do. personally i love games like these where there's no real stress, you can just decorate your onsen and watch as the coins come rolling in. excited to see the other scenarios the game has, too

This game is a must-play for fans of cute pixel art! It's the perfect, cozy way to unwind.
I absolutely love collecting a massive number of letters containing delightful animal pictures. Additionally, the Maltese's outfit is actually cute.
This is an adorable game that doubles as a screen-buddy/screensaver when working on other tasks. 10/10 would recommend to anyone who enjoys decorating/styling, cute animals, and cozy games.
A very stress free game, I don't think there is a loss condition? Which I am a big fan of. Lots of customization options and many fun ways to design your Onsen.

Fun little Idle-Game on your Desktop in the style of rusty's retirement.
Once in a while added content, multiple stages / levels of the onsen and cute animals.

the game is pretty good but i think what would make it better is if golden retriver also has the options for wearing outfits similarly to what maltese has. 

Thanks for making such a cute idle game!

I play this game while doing my college math homework (Horrible, terrible, no good.) Genuinely it has made sitting down to get shit done so much more tolerable. Being able to set it to outside only mode on the smallest size means I'm not distracted by anything my little guys are doing, while still enjoying the catchy music and comforting atmosphere. Seriously, the songs are bops. My only critique is that I wish more items were rotatable. Especially the baths. It doesn't make sense to me why they wouldn't be. But overall, great game that has served its purpose immensely.
it was cute and pixel but i cant use part of my screen when i put in the background. SORRY I DONT HAVE A SECOND MONITOR LIKE SOMEONE.

i am running a bathhouse
i did not ask for this responsibility
and yet here i am, 47 hours later, 
adjusting bath temperatures for a corgi.

   place bath ‚Üí watch animals soak ‚Üí money ‚Üí more bath

i leave this running at the bottom of my screen 
while i "work." i check on it every 4 minutes. 
the animals are relaxing. i am not.

  ‚Ä¢ bubble machines
  ‚Ä¢ herbal bags
  ‚Ä¢ the little guy slipping on wet floors (sorry)
I love being able to just have it in the background or play for 3 hours straight! It's addictive, adorable and relaxing.

This game is truly revolutionary, the fact that the mulch nation is breaking through to so many platforms, and now steam, is truly beautiful, as a loam fairy I have been waiting for this day to come for centuries, I wish my parents were still here with me, they'd shed a tear knowing that the influence of mulch is now so powerful and widely recognised and appreciated. I will make sure my Onsen is fluffy and my Maltese is open for business! thank you!
very nice cozy game nice for your 2nd monitor

It's so cute and i love the chill soundtrack. Unfortunately it doesn't work on linux, so I cant use it during work :D It would be really nice to have a moving tool to move several items easier, like with the erasing tool. Cheers!

It can be a bit of a grind to unlock other customers and locations, but this game is meant to be played in the background while you focus on your other tasks.

Relaxing soundtrack, adorable sprites and having the freedom and creativity in planning your bathhouse just makes it such a relaxing game to play! Appreciate the updates the developers put into this game to make it even more interesting.
Very cute an Relaxing game. I also really love the Soundtrack, will probably buy the DLCs soon :)

What a chill game... let all your stress melt away as you plan your floor layouts and wallpaper. You have problems, sit down and play this for a bit then go tackle the world with vigor... read the poems and letters the animals send you!

So relaxing, I love this, I can't stop playing until I unlock every animal.
It is so chill, no unhappy customers, just get money and stars to use, or you don't. So simple.

Originally got this game to add to the list of idle games to play...........
Did I mention I only got this game yesterday?
Cute, and cozy. Though it is impossible to fullscreen or turn into a window.

It gets repetitive but overall this is a cute game. Bought the game because of the Maltese but it turned out to be better than i expected. Cute little onsen management game with relaxing music. Worth the purchase.
Very cute and affordable! It's relaxing to play or just have in the background and watch cute little animals relax in the spa :)

I really like it but I wish there was a button to change the size of the game. It takes up a bit too much space on my stream the way it is now. If it's possible to change it to be smaller then I would be able to more comfortably play this while doing art on stream!

Super cute and relaxing game, nice to have on in the background while watching a show or doing some work. SUPER cute characters and many way to decorate your bathhouse. The great idle game and the soundtrack is very relaxing.
enjoyed it sm, i ended up buying blind boxes of them
very silly, fun to watch while doing other stuff
love this game with it was on switch also this would be perfect for it i think lol
Great idle game. Cute characters.

[h3] overall: 4.5/5 [/h3]

[u] features i enjoyed :) [/u]
[list]
    [*]very adorable! characters, animations, backgrounds... all super cute :>
    [*]fairly intuitive controls/gameplay
    [*]love the new features that come with the dlc... fingers crossed there's more coming out!!
    [*]keeps me motivated to continue doing work, and good for a quick, easy little break in between work sessions!
[/list]

[u] things to consider...  [/u]
[list]
    [*]ui kinda gets in the way... wish there were more settings to adjust it
    [*]more hotkeys, perhaps? maybe i just couldn't find them but it'd be nice if i could open the baths tab with [b], or the operating facilities tab with [o], etc
    [*]might just be my old device but the game makes my whole laptop lag + battery gets really hot and drains really quick, especially if my spa has more levels/customers... understandable, and not something i blame the devs for, but just putting it out there!
    [*]i wish there were more items. for the low price, it's not that big a deal. although within just the base game, you have 9 stages in total. each stage only unlocks 6 new items, which means for 9 different stages - 45 levels if you upgrade each stage to the max - you're using the same limited numbers of items/designs... some of which don't really go with the vibe of certain stages... maybe it's just a creativity skill issue on my end LOL
[/list]
Can't recommend this game. There aren't enough dogs
the one time i forgot that my pc was on and came back with 350 stars and 62K gold / awesome good game (‚óè'‚ó°'‚óè)
im an absolute SUCKER for simulator games. the graphics are so cute!!!
if you want to watch cute animals melt into hot soup this is your game!
10/10 i'm a certified maltese boss now heheh
pretty chill, gets boring fast tho
Whimsy animals run a bathhouse. It's very cute
very comfy and cozy game, I liiikee
Cute creatures
the best game ever
great idle game :)
Cute and relaxing
me likey game
Cute game
cute idle game <3
SILLY LITTLE ANIMALS IN THE SPA WAHAHAH BUY IT!
nice
noice
It's so peak
I love Maltese and Poodle~~
very cute
me love being dog mom
I LOVE MALTESE
12/10 FLUFFINESS!!

For anyone who is seeing this reviews. Yes, I do recommend btw

I absolutley love this game, its a cozy game that does'nt require too much effort and you progress relativly fast, I love  the creators artworks which is why I downloaded the game in the first place. I hope to find more games like this that transport me to old facebook games

HELP, I'm trapped in my own onsen.
I can't close the game because it's just too much fun and way too cute.

I found this to be a very relaxing and cute pixel game.

I very much enjoy the different levels, all the customization options, and the letter system.
 The soundtrack for this game is AMAZING 15/10 <3

I am not a fan of most games coming out nowadays most being way too expensive or just made like crap and run like crap, but this was nice refresher, something affordable for most, Easy to pick up, and never has any issues running or anything like that... and something I def feel like my 82 hours and counting was def worth the $5 I spent on this game. 

I would def recommend this to my friends / family.

This game is so adorable! <3 The characters were originally made by a Korean artist and became popular through KakaoTalk. The gameplay itself is really chill. There's lots of relaxing music, and you can decorate your onsen however you like. Don't worry about making mistakes because if you mess up your design, the price you paid will be returned, which is super forgiving.

Once you collect all the required mail from each location, you'll receive a key that let's you unlock another hot spring. It's a simulation game, so there's not much to do beyond decorating and enjoying the cozy vibe, but that's exactly what makes it relaxing.

It sits nicely at the bottom of your screen while you do other things, which I love! I haven't gotten the DLC yet, but definitely plan to because this game deserves the support. <3
I got this game to have a cute little desktop idler, but I end up focusing on decorating my bathhouse all day instead. It's been awful for my productivity. 10/10

It's super cute and relaxing! I recommend! ‚ÇäÀö Íí∞‡∏ÖÀòœâÀò‡∏ÖÍí± Àö‚Çä

I originally bought this to be able to get the wallpaper on the points shop but now I'm actually really enjoying decorating my lil' onsen and collecting all the animals! :3

The dogs and animals in the game are very cute and adorable. 
However, the game has a serious black screen issue. I hope the game developers can properly address this problem, instead of requiring players to manually find the game's launcher file in their folder and change the "Compatibility" option to "Disable Full-Screen Optimization" to solve the issue. 
I have these complaints because many similar desktop games on Steam that I've played don't have this problem, so I believe the developers can and should properly handle this black screen issue.

Remarks : If there are any solutions or updates to this problem (besides telling players to manually adjust compatibility), I will change my comment to positive.

Update: The developers have released an update that automatically resolves this issue, fantastic! This is a really good idle game, highly recommended !!!

[h3]Delicious Pixels, Soothing Screen Idler ‚ú©¬∞ÔΩ°Ÿ©(Àä·óúÀã)Ÿà[/h3]
[i][b]Be warned, if you're looking for new/innovative gameplay, this is more of a cute pixel screensaver compared to an actual game.  ö(*¬¥Íí≥`*)…û !!![/b][/i]

If you're a fan of idler games, this is a nice game to pick up on a sale. There's not much gameplay outside of decorating your onsen and waiting to collect your coins, but don't let that deter you from trying it out!! If you've played Ropuka's Idle Island or Tiny Pasture this is a similar concept. ‚ô°

The fact that there are [b][i]more than 8 different destinations[/i][/b] you can open your onsen at are very impressive, the gameplay and customization potential are very open for whatever aesthetic you are going for. Full coin refund upon bath/accessories deletion is a huge plus, so you never feel like you're losing progress. 

This is a soothing pixel bar that is wonderful to have in your background as you're studying/working!! 8/10

My wife was decorating my steam profile and was looking at the steam shops and found the cutest emotes. She pointed at the screen and said we had to buy it. I absolutely love the joy on her face seeing the cute characters or her just decorating. It's usually not my type of game but it was the cutest thing seeing her watch and play with these characters; she even changed a character in the game and named it after me. Thank you for not just bringing my wife joy but Introducing me to this genre of games.

negative.review: genuinely sad to say that there is not enough content in this game (even for an idle game) to be worth the price. my apolocheese, kawaii girlies. you may now execute me for my crimes.

DO NOT buy this game if you care about gameplay value!!!
Â¶ÇÊûú‰Ω†Âú®ÊÑèÊ∏∏ÊàèÂèØÁé©ÊÄßÁöÑËØùËØ∑‰∏çË¶ÅË¥≠‰π∞ËøôÊ¨æÊ∏∏ÊàèÔºåÂπ∂‰∏î‰∏çË¶ÅÊãâ‰Ω†ÁöÑÊúãÂèãÂÖ•Âùë„ÄÇ

My reasoning - this game looks cute and I looove Maltese as an IP, but this game has no substance - almost all items are unlocked within a couple of hours while you are doing almost nothing. How you use items or arrange them has very little impact. I kept getting new content - new text, new animated sprite, new music, etc., but they have very little meaning if they don't affect gameplay.
ÊàëÂñúÊ¨¢Á∫øÊù°Â∞èÁãóËøô‰∏™ipÔºå‰ΩÜÊàë‰∏çÂñúÊ¨¢Ëøô‰∏™È°πÁõÆÔºåÂÆÉÁöÑÊï¥‰∏™Á≥ªÁªüËÆæËÆ°ÁöÑÂ•ΩÂÉèÂ∞±ÂçïÁ∫Ø‰∏∫‰∫ÜÂçñÈí±ÔºåÈáåÈù¢ÁöÑÂÜÖÂÆπÊòØ‰∏ÄÂ†ÜÂ•ΩÁúãÁöÑÊëÜ‰ª∂„ÄÇÊàëÂ∏åÊúõÁîªÂá∫Ëøô‰πàÂèØÁà±ÁîªÈù¢ÁöÑ‰∫∫ËÉΩÂ§üÂéªÂÅö‰∫õÊõ¥ÊúâÊÑè‰πâÁöÑÂÜÖÂÆπ„ÄÇ

It's cute and will hold your interest for maybe 15-20 minutes before you realize that there's not much more to it than what you're already doing. 
Most of the unlocks just kind of happen over time if you leave things sitting long enough. There's a few minor management elements, but the effect they have on the game is negligible if anything.  The UI is pretty clunky too.
If you want some overly cute pixel art animals that move around, go for it.
If you want anything resembling a management game or sim, stay away.

I know I have a lot of hours into it, but I often just let it play on the background without really looking at it.
Unfortunately the game had my full attention for about two hours until I got very bored.
It's still cute and good for what it is... I love the idea and aesthetic. But there is not much to do.
& When it comes to the question "would I recommend", I'd have to say no.
genuinely sad to say that there is not enough content in this game (even for an idle game) to be worth the price. my apolocheese, kawaii girlies. you may now execute me for my crimes.
It's insane that the creators of the game only let the game switch between 2 screens. I just can't understand what are they thinking. That only issue, makes this game an absolute 0/10.

DO NOT buy this game if you care about gameplay value!!!
